name: Jose Luis Colomer
title: Software & Energy Engineer
subtitle: Bridging the gap between sustainable energy and cutting-edge technology
about: I'm a passionate engineer specializing in the intersection of software development and energy systems. With expertise in both domains, I create innovative solutions that drive efficiency and sustainability in modern energy infrastructure.

My background combines deep technical knowledge in software engineering with practical experience in energy systems, allowing me to develop comprehensive solutions for complex challenges in the renewable energy sector.
